Class OrganizerEventsAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<OrganizerEventsAdapter.EventVH>
com.example.ajilore.code.ui.events.list.OrganizerEventsAdapter
public class OrganizerEventsAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<OrganizerEventsAdapter.EventVH>
RecyclerView.Adapter that binds EventItem objects for the organizer's event list. Handles image loading for event poster, subtitle visibility, and click actions for both row and edit icon.

  • Nested Class Summary

    static class
